title: Doctors warn against relying on AI tools for medical advice
description: Hyderabad: Doctors in Hyderabad have cautioned people against relying solely on artificial intelligence (AI) tools such as ChatGPT for medical advice..

title: UK firms plan 3% pay rises in coming year, see AI hit to jobs, survey shows
description: British employers expect to raise wages by 3% in the next 12 months, but some recruiters expect artificial intelligence to shrink their workforce, according to a survey that showed firms were worried about the impact of government tax plans on hiring.
content: LONDON, Nov 10 (Reuters) - British employers expect to raise wages by 3% in the next 12 months, but some recruiters expect artificial intelligence to shrink their workforce, according to a survey that showed firms were worried about the impact of gov... [2298 chars]

title: One in six employers expect job cuts from AI in next year
description: Survey by Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development reveals the extent of the threat to white-collar workers from artificial intelligence
content:
It is the latest indicator of the impact AI poses to the jobs market, which is grappling with slower hiring since employment costs rose in last year’s budget.

title: Arab Parliament commends UAE's experience in employing AI in justice sector
description: Mohammed bin Ahmed Al Yammahi, President of the Arab Parliament, praised the rapid development of the justice sector in the United Arab Emirates, which has been achieved through the country's deployment of artificial intelligence technologies and digital transformation within the judicial system.

title: Goldman Sees US Investors Flocking to Japan as Nikkei Surges
description: US investors are increasingly buying Japanese stocks focused on tech and artificial intelligence, lured by the country’s outsized returns compared with US stocks, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.
content:
US investors are increasingly buying Japanese stocks focused on tech and artificial intelligence, lured by the country’s outsized returns compared with US stocks, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.

description: Underlining the challenges posed by emerging technologies, Chief Justice of India-designate Justice Surya Kant has flagged the misuse of artificial intelligence (AI) tools to target women journalists.

title: Can allowing a teacher a graceful exit be considered illegal dismissal?
description: AS access to knowledge and information for educational purposes becomes easier with the influx of modern technology and digital solutions, ethical and administrative issues also rise. title: RPT-Wall St Week Ahead-Investors watching US economic signs as market pulls back, tech teeters
description: This week, concerns about expensive equity valuations, especially for high-flying stocks linked to enthusiasm over artificial intelligence, were exacerbated by tepid jobs data, including a report that showed surging layoff announcements from U.S. employers.
